radiographic_examinations.findings: Characteristic features of borderline lepromatous HD with moderate numbers of bacilli.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A second biopsy one month later revealed greater organization of the inflammatory infiltrate and increased lymphocytic clustering, consistent with a type 1 leprosy reaction.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Histopathological features of borderline lepromatous HD.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Another biopsy after 6 months of MDT revealed increased organization and decreased extent of inflammation, as well as a reduced bacterial load.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Advanced regression of the lesion with no residual bacilli.
